Text: So, what kinda foe do you reckon we're about to face then?
It'd just be some other jackass that I gotta defeat, then we go home, rinse and repeat for the next time.
Yeah but like what if you died REALLY hard and never came back...
Then I guess this cycle of work I've found myself in would finally come to a close.
Sgt. Fulp would need to hire someone new.
And without me you'd probably have to actually work, or something.
The mere thought of it makes me shudder.
